metadata.Title: CVE-2017-6832 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Heap-based buffer overflow in the decodeBlock in MSADPCM.cpp in Audio File Library (aka audiofile) 0.3.6, 0.3.5, 0.3.4, 0.3.3, 0.3.2, 0.3.1, 0.3.0, 0.2.7 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via a crafted file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-6832` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

audiofile-tools - 0.3.6-2ubuntu0.16.04.1
libaudiofile1 - 0.3.6-2ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: audiofile package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.3.6-2ubuntu0.16.04.1').
